Aluno¶

class sistema.models.aluno.Aluno(*args, **kwargs)¶
Parâmetros:
  • nome – models.CharField(max_length=250)
  • email – models.EmailField(verbose_name=”E-mail”)
  • telefone – models.CharField(max_length=11)
  • turma – models.CharField(max_length=250)
  • curso – models.CharField(max_length=250)
  • matricula – models.CharField(max_length=250)
  • excluido – models.BooleanField(verbose_name=’Excluído’, default=False)
class sistema.views.aluno.AlunoCreateView(**kwargs)¶

class sistema.views.aluno.AlunoDeleteView(**kwargs)¶

class sistema.views.aluno.AlunoListView(**kwargs)¶
